node.title: Manchester United's Ole Gunnar Solskjaer sacked as manager
node.alt: A glum-looking Premier League manager holds his hand up to acknowledge fans' disappointment after his team loses a match.
node.description: The sacking comes after a humiliating 4-1 defeat to Watford, their fourth loss in five Premier League games.
node.content: ["Ole Gunnar Solskjaer\u00a0has been sacked as Manchester United manager, the club has announced.", "The Norwegian's\u00a0time at the club was in jeopardy after United slumped to its fourth defeat in five Premier League games on Saturday, losing 4-1 to Watford.", "The Red Devils had suffered comprehensive defeats to arch-rivals Liverpool and Manchester City in recent weeks.", "In a statement, the club said it parted ways with its former star striker \"with regret\".", "\"Ole will always be a legend at Manchester United and it is with regret that we have reached this difficult decision,\" it said.\u00a0", "\"While the past few weeks have been disappointing, they should not obscure all the work he has done over the past three years to rebuild the foundations for long-term success.\"", "Former United captain Michael Carrick will take over the team while the club searches for an interim manager for the remainder of the season.", "More to come.\u00a0"]
